name: Infopulse
description:
Delivering excellence in Software R&D, Application Services, Cloud & IT Infrastructure, and Cybersecurity for clients worldwide, Infopulse has built a reputation of a trusted full-service digital solution provider. Founded in 1991, the company has over 2,000 professionals and is represented in 11 countries across Europe and North America.
Our core competencies:
Software Development & Consulting
Infrastructure & Cloud Services
Systems Integration
Microsoft / SAP Services & Consulting
Cybersecurity Services
Quality Assurance
Telecom Network Operations
Business Process Outsourcing
Our expertise:
AI, Machine Learning, Chatbots
AR/VR/MR
BI & Big Data
Blockchain
Business Apps: ERP, CRM, ECM
Cloud & DevOps
Data Science
Digital Transformation
Embedded Software
IoT & M2M
Mobile Apps
UX/UI
Infopulse provides tailored services and solutions for Automotive, Banking & Finance, Energy & Utilities, Healthcare & Pharma, FinTech, Manufacturing, Retail & Wholesale, Software & High-Tech, Telecom, and other industries.
Infopulse operates in accordance with European company culture, tolerance, and compliance, which is highly appreciated by both our clients and employees. As a part of EVRY, #2 largest IT company in the Nordics, Infopulse also strictly complies with the policies and guidelines set by the parent company.
Infopulse is a certified partner of Microsoft, SAP, Cisco, Citrix, IBM, and complies with the highest international corporate governance standards, being ISO 9001, ISO 27001, and ISO 14001 certified.
